sorry, I can hear it but I have been listening to them for about 5 years.. I will figure out how to make them clearer.

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          Hi David,
 
I'm sorry but I don't hear anything on that file, possibly a very faint whisper.
If you are new to evp you can drop me a line, my e-mail is
paranormalinvestigating@...
 
Let me know what your recording process is, what equipment your using also
how and if you are editing the recording. I will try to give you some pointers
but god knows my evp's are far from perfect.
 
Bruce


    Bruce Halliday 
Paranormal Investigating Team
